name: DinoRun (Edova)
description:
Dino Run is a thrilling endless runner game that will take you on a wild adventure through a prehistoric world. As a dinosaur, you must run, jump, and dodge obstacles in your path, all while collecting coins and power-ups to help you on your journey. With simple controls and addictive gameplay, you'll find yourself playing for hours on end.

The game features multiple levels with increasing difficulty, each one filled with unique challenges and obstacles to overcome. You'll have to be quick and agile to avoid Flysorous, Cactus, and other hazards that will slow you down or even end your run.

With vibrant graphics and catchy music, Dino Run is a game that will appeal to players of all ages and skill levels. Whether you're looking for a quick diversion or a long-term challenge, this endless runner game is sure to provide hours of fun and excitement. So what are you waiting for? Start your adventure and see how far you can run!
